data.text: @MSMWatchdog2013 If you need to discuss a specific booking, we'd be happy to assist- just DM us to speak with an agent. Thanks - Jen 2/2

@MSMWatchdog2013 Hi there, I understand that you're not going to use the voucher. If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. 1/2

data.text: @ravi_khetarpal Hi Ravi, I'm sorry to hear you still haven't received your baggage and I certainly understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and you can reach them here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Norine

@Fatal_Ataxia Hi @Fatal_Ataxia, sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks– Kimmy

@tomtomsydney Hi @tomtomsydney, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible but we’re so glad that our airport was on-hand to help make your experience better. We'll pass on the feedback. Thanks - Kimmy

@capt_FI Hi @capt_FI, sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks -Kimmy

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @sidA350 Hi @sidA350, sorry to hear this. If you're transferring between domestic flights, in most cases you’ll need to collect your baggage, check in again and transfer your bags. For more info, please click this link - https://t.co/9ElsfmGS39 Thanks - Kimmy

@MarkGibb16 Hi Mark. I can understand that you're worried about your flight - we do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, such as making any changes, we’d be happy to help – just send us a DM here. Thanks- Jen
